title: Sollividu Sollividu Lyrics Kaaviya Thalaivan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Sollividu Sollividu
Singer: Mukesh
Music: A.R.Rahman
Lyricist: Pa.Vijay
Movie: Kaaviya Thalaivan

Sollividu Sollividu Sollividu
Irudhi Theerpai Nee Sollividu
Nindru Vidu Nindru Vidu Nindru Vidu
Ipporil Ivvidam Nindruvidu

Sendruvidu Sendruvidu Sendruvidu
Intha Yutham Podhum Sendru Vidu
Innum Uyirgal Vendum Endraal Ennai
Mudhalil Neeye Kondruvidu.

Kannaa Ennai Mudhalil Kondruvidu
Aaen Ambai Aendhavaithaai
Aaen Kuruthiyil Neendha Veithaai
Aaen Ulagathai Jeyikavaithaai
Aaen Ullukkul Thorkkadithaai

Ullagathai Vellavaithaai
Ullukkule Thorkadithaai
Kaandeebam Ketkiren Kannaaa
Kaandeebam Ketkiren

Sollividu Sollividu Sollividu
Irudhi Theerpai Nee Sollividu
Nindru Vidu Nindru Vidu Nindru Vidu
Ipporil Ivvidam Nindruvidu

Kaalachakaram Un Kaiyil
Adhil Sutriyatheno Naan
Vidhiyum Sadhiyum Un Kannil
Athil Sikkiyatheno Naan

Karnanai Kondra Paavam
Kannanukku Pogum Enraal
Kannanukke Paavam Thandha
Paavam Engu Pogumaiyo.

Sollividu Sollividu Sollividu
Irudhi Theerpai Nee Sollividu
Nindru Vidu Nindru Vidu Nindru Vidu
Ipporil Ivvidam Nindruvidu

Ulagame Yutham Èdharku
Oh Uyirgale Ratham Èdharku
Oh Iraivane Thuyaram Èdharku
Oh Idhayame Vanmam Èdharku

Kannaa Therai Niruththu
Ellam Veezhthi Evarudan Vaazha
Therai Niruththu.

Podhum Intha Kurudhi Kuliyal
Porai Niruththu
Naalai Ulagam Nalam Perum Endru
Porai Niruththu..
Poraai Niruththu..
